title: Privacy Station - Drop Down for Bimini Top
features: velcro to the underside of the bimini on the middle bows

description: You are buying a brand new drop down privacy station that attaches to the underside of a bimini top. This gives you just the right amount of privacy on your boat for whatever your need. The picture shows it sitting on a table so we tucked the rest of the curtain under itself. It is actually 72" long by 30" wide by 27" deep. This may not seem like much room, but bear in mind this is material that allows much more room than you may think. There is a double pull zipper for easy access. It velcros to the middle bows of your bimini top. . This makes it lightweight and easy to store anywhere. Compare at 100.00 elsewhere.
